name: Mini-football
description:
You have a mini football pitch in your hands with a football on it and 13 legs as your opposition. 

Tilt the pitch using A,S,D,W to roll the ball to the goal at the other end and score.

If the ball touches one of the legs it's game over and the match resets.

Press R at any time to reset the ball and pitch positions (if you find a bug ;). 

Press X to restart. 

Good luck.

(edit) Had to reupload as one line of code was breaking the game.

SOUND CREDIT FROM freesound.org:
